verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> came to me. <WH559>

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "I am jealous <WH7065> for Zion <WH6726> with great <WH1419> jealousy, <WH7068> and I am jealous <WH7065> for her with great <WH1419> wrath. <WH2534>"

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> "I have returned <WH7725> to Zion, <WH6726> and will dwell <WH7931> in the midst <WH8432> of Jerusalem. <WH3389> Jerusalem <WH3389> shall be called <WH7121> <WH5892> 'The City of Truth; <WH571>' and the mountain <WH2022> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> <WH6944> 'The Holy Mountain. <WH2022>'"

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "Old men <WH2205> and old women <WH2205> will again dwell <WH3427> in the streets <WH7339> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> every man <WH376> with his staff <WH4938> in his hand <WH3027> for very <WH7230> age. <WH3117>
The streets <WH7339> of the city <WH5892> will be full <WH4390> of boys <WH3206> and girls <WH3207> playing <WH7832> in its streets. <WH7339>"

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "If it is marvelous <WH6381> in the eyes <WH5869> of the remnant <WH7611> of this people <WH5971> in those days, <WH3117> should it also be marvelous <WH6381> in my eyes? <WH5869>" says <WH5002> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies. <WH6635>
Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "Behold, <WH3467> I will save my people <WH5971> from the east <WH4217> country, <WH776> and from the west <WH3996> country; <WH776>

and I will bring <WH935> them, <WH7931> and they will dwell in the midst <WH8432> of Jerusalem; <WH3389> and they will be my people, <WH5971> and I will be their God, <WH430> in truth <WH571> and in righteousness. <WH6666>"

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "Let your hands <WH3027> be strong, <WH2388> you who hear <WH8085> in these days <WH3117> these words <WH1697> from the mouth <WH6310> of the prophets <WH5030> who were in the day <WH3117> that the foundation <WH3245> of the house <WH1004> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> was laid, <WH3245> even the temple, <WH1964> that it might be built. <WH1129>

For before <WH6440> those days <WH3117> there was <WH1961> no wages <WH7939> for man, <WH120> nor any wages <WH7939> for an animal; <WH929> neither was there any peace <WH7965> to him who went out <WH3318> or came in, <WH935> because of the adversary. <WH6862> For I set <WH7971> all men <WH120> everyone <WH376> against his neighbor. <WH7453>
But now I will not be to the remnant <WH7611> of this people <WH5971> as in the former <WH7223> days, <WH3117>" says <WH5002> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies. <WH6635>

"For the seed <WH2233> of peace <WH7965> and the vine <WH1612> will yield <WH5414> its fruit, <WH6529> and the ground <WH776> will give <WH5414> its increase, <WH2981> and the heavens <WH8064> will give <WH5414> their dew; <WH2919> and I will cause the remnant <WH7611> of this people <WH5971> to inherit all these things. <WH5157>

It shall come to pass that, <WH7045> as you were a curse among the nations, <WH1471> house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> and house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> so will I save <WH3467> you, <WH1293> and you shall be a blessing. Don't <WH3372> be afraid. Let your hands <WH3027> be strong. <WH2388>"

For thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "As I thought <WH2161> to do evil <WH7489> to you, <WH1> when your fathers provoked me to wrath, <WH7107>" says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> "and I didn't <WH5162> repent;
so again <WH7725> have I thought <WH2161> in these days <WH3117> to do good <WH3190> to Jerusalem <WH3389> and to the house <WH1004> of Judah. <WH3063> Don't <WH3372> be afraid.

These are the things <WH1697> that you shall do: <WH6213> speak <WH1696> every man <WH376> the truth <WH571> with his neighbor. <WH7453> Execute <WH8199> the judgment <WH4941> of truth <WH571> and peace <WH7965> in your gates, <WH8179>

and let none <WH376> of you devise <WH2803> evil <WH7451> in your hearts <WH3824> against his neighbor, <WH7453> and love <WH157> no false <WH8267> oath: <WH7621> for all these are things that I hate, <WH8130>" says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>
The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> came to me. <WH559>

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "The fasts <WH6685> of the fourth <WH7243> fifth, <WH2549> seventh, <WH7637> and tenth <WH6224> months shall be for the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> joy <WH8342> and gladness, <WH8057> and cheerful <WH2896> feasts. <WH4150> Therefore love <WH157> truth <WH571> and peace. <WH7965>"
Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "Many peoples, <WH5971> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of many <WH7227> cities <WH5892> will yet come; <WH935>

and the inhabitants <WH3427> of one <WH259> shall go <WH1980> to another, <WH259> saying, <WH559> <WH3212> 'Let us go speedily <WH1980> to entreat <WH2470> the favor <WH6440> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and to seek <WH1245> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies. <WH6635> I will go also. <WH3212>'

Yes, <WH7227> many peoples <WH5971> and strong <WH6099> nations <WH1471> will come <WH935> to seek <WH1245> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> and to entreat <WH2470> the favor <WH6440> of Yahweh. <WH3068>"

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> "In those days, <WH3117> ten <WH6235> men <WH582> will take hold, <WH2388> out of all the languages <WH3956> of the nations, <WH1471> they will take hold <WH2388> of the skirt <WH3671> of him who is a Jew, <WH376> saying, <WH559> <WH3212> 'We will go with you, <WH8085> for we have heard that God is with you. <WH430>'"
